name: azdoLeaseGen
description: Create leases for pipeline runs, will add a manual retention to avoid unintentional deletion
author: Julio Guzman

inputs.name: daysValid
inputs.label: Lease valid days
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of days to consider the lease valid

inputs.name: protectPipeline
inputs.label: Protect Pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prevent the pipeline from being deleted while the lease is still valid

inputs.name: leaseType
inputs.label: Lease (Lock) Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Begin: Will create a temporary lease to protect from deletion between stages, ex: if you are waiting for manual validations it will not allow deletions 
, End: Will delete temporary Begin leases (if any) and will set a new one to mark it as complete, ex: you want to retain the last complete runs from a definition and not just the last executed

inputs.name: maxNumberLeases
inputs.label: Maximum number of leases per complete run
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Number of completed runs to retain, it will automatically clean up old active leases and will leave just the latest number specified here. 
 *** Only applies to End Lease (lock) type.
